question: The death of Crassus ended the First Triumvirate, which also included Pompey and this man who conquered Gaul and was assassinated on the Ides of March. [Question courtesy of National Academic Quiz Tournaments, LLC.]
'It was a pleasure to burn' opens this novel by Ray Bradbury titled for the temperature at which books catch fire. [Question courtesy of National Academic Quiz Tournaments, LLC.]

During his confirmation hearings, this man denied that he had ever read the book The Exorcist. Name this man who claimed he was the victim of a “high-tech lynching” during hearings in which he was accused of sexual harassment by Anita Hill.
